posts.post_title: FS: N172 Tip O'Neill SGC 40 -- SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
Morning Folks,

   As noted in some other posts, I am downsizing my collection yet again (moving this time).  That means ol' Tip here has to go.  Per the title, it's an SGC 40.  $275, shipped and insured.

If you're interested, drop me an email.  A scan is available, as well, but it's a bit large, so just ask and I'll email it to you.

Thanks in advance,

Richard.


Card has been sold.  Thanks!
